body_html:
@carpodaster you're right! It's just in the team form – I was convinced we had that hint in the project description field, too. d'oh! https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/master/app/views/teams/_form.html.slim#L44
and thank you ✨

body:
@carpodaster you're right! It's just in the team form – I was convinced we had that `hint` in the project description field, too. d'oh! https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/master/app/views/teams/_form.html.slim#L44
and thank you :sparkles:
